coref_content: Green House home will be first of their kind in Champaign County Chicago, IL ( PRWEB ) September 28, 2015 last Thursday, September 24, in Urbana, IL, team member from the Chicago office of international design and architecture firm Perkins Eastman join leadership from Clark - Lindsey for the groundbreaking of Champaign County Chicago, IL's new small home for specialized dementia care — one devote to assist living and the other for skilled nursing care — that will follow the GREEN HOUSE ® model. each home will feature 12 private bedroom, individualized care from specially train caregiver, and home furnishing. team member from the Chicago office of international design and architecture firm Perkins Eastman international design and architecture firm Perkins Eastman be lead by Principal Jerry Walleck AIA and Associate Principal Ramu Ramachandran AIA, LEED AP, two key member of international design and architecture firm Perkins Eastman's renowned senior living practice area. Clark - Lindsey have partner with the Green House Project and international design and architecture firm Perkins Eastman to help usher in a new and superior standard of care for those suffer from Alzheimer ’s and dementia - relate illness. the introduction of their not only mark the Green House Project but also a major step forward for how Champaign County Chicago, IL provider and regulatory official be look to institute efficient and innovative care model for senior. Green House home be design to provide a personalized model of care within a real home setting, replete with an open kitchen, dining room and other common area, set their apart from the traditional institutional model that can resemble a hospital or nursing home. the new home, situate on a 10,000 sf footprint, will feature an architectural design where every inch of space have be carefully consider in order to transform the physical environment to feel more like home. from the outdoor courtyard, library and den area to the open kitchen provide home cook meal, these amenity encourage social contact among elder and caregiver. Green House home's design be tailor to maintain exist on - site tree as well as acknowledge the natural surrounding with respect to building proportion, scale and form, while also take full advantage of the expansive view of adjacent Meadowbrook Park. Clark - Lindsey be already know within the industry as a leader and innovator when it come to care, " say Principal Jerry Walleck AIA, and Green House home be a continuation of that. Green House home will provide invaluable care and service to dementia resident and dementia resident's family, and it ’ an enormous privilege to have play Clark - Lindsey's part in make provide happen. " Clark - Lindsey Village be found in 1978 and be the area ’s first and only CCRC. Clark - Lindsey Village be one of only eight certify Centers for Successful Aging in the U.S. in addition to Clark - Lindsey Village's forthcoming dementia care small home, Clark - Lindsey Village offer extensive independent living accommodation, as well as inpatient and outpatient therapy service, assist living and skilled nursing care at Clark - Lindsey Village's Meadowbrook Health Center. read full article the Green House Project be a radically new national model for skilled nursing care that return control, dignity and a sense of well - being to elder, elder's family and direct care staff. in the Green House Project, resident receive care in small, self - contain home organize to deliver individualized care and meaningful relationship between resident and care staff. about Perkins Eastman Perkins Eastman be among the top design and architecture firm in the world. with almost 950 employee in 14 location around the world, Perkins Eastman practice at every scale of the build environment. from niche building to complex project that enrich whole community, Perkins Eastman's portfolio reflect a dedication to progressive and inventive design that enhance the quality of the human experience. with work in 46 state and more than 40 country, the firm ’s portfolio include transportation and public infrastructure, high - end residential, commercial, hotel, retail, office building, corporate interior, school, hospital, museum, senior living, and public sector facility. Perkins Eastman provide award - win design through Perkins Eastman's office in North America ( New York, NY ; Boston, MA ; Charlotte, NC ; Chicago, IL ; Los Angeles, CA ; Pittsburgh, PA ; San Francisco, CA ; Stamford, CT ; Toronto, Canada ; and Washington, DC ) ; South America ( Guayaquil, Ecuador ) ; North Africa and Middle East ( Dubai, UAE ) ; and Asia ( Mumbai, India, and Shanghai, China ). image available. # # # for the original version on PRWeb visit :

The Parade of Homes 2015 will showcase newer and larger homes in central Ohio..
Ball says there is a big difference between long-term care homes and personal care homes. Opposes private long-term care. #nlpoli.
